item.title: Need some help with player thing on top of server
item.dc:creator: @Zenzie Zenzie
item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

//Playercount and server name at top of screen public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126(" @red@~@whi@Z@red@e@gre@n@cya@z@whi@o@red@s@gre@c@cya@a@whi@p@red@e@whi@~", 6570); sendFrame126("@red@Hello @whi@"+playerName+".", 6572); sendFrame126("@red@CB lv @whi@"pcombat".", 6574); sendFrame126(" @red@Players On - " + players, 6664); setInterfaceWalkable(6673);//6673 }

got his but were the “pcombat” is i want to show the player’s combat lvl

also i want it on the side of the serv help me

Read full topic
item.source: Need some help with player thing on top of server
